mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", so.name as "office.name", a.inv_name AS "invName", a.tax_no AS "taxNo", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.addr_id AS "bizLocation.id", c.province_id as "bizLocation.province.id", province.name as "bizLocation.province.name", c.city_id as "bizLocation.city.id", city.name as "bizLocation.city.name", c.region_id as "bizLocation.region.id", reg.name as "bizLocation.region.name", c.address as "bizLocation.address", a.tel AS "tel", a.account AS "account", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", su.name as "updateBy.name", a.update_time AS "updateDate"

LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON a.office_id=so.id left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id LEFT JOIN common_location c ON c.id=a.addr_id LEFT JOIN sys_region province ON c.province_id=province.id LEFT JOIN sys_region city ON c.city_id = city.id LEFT JOIN sys_region reg ON c.region_id = reg.id LEFT JOIN biz_custom_center_consultant ccs ON ccs.cust_id=a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office s on s.id=ccs.center_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_invoice_info( id, office_id, inv_name, tax_no, bank_name, addr_id, tel, account, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{invName}, #{taxNo}, #{bankName}, #{bizLocation.id}, #{tel}, #{account}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_invoice_info SET office_id = #{office.id}, inv_name = #{invName}, tax_no = #{taxNo}, bank_name = #{bankName}, addr_id = #{bizLocation.id}, tel = #{tel}, account = #{account}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
